_aArchiveFileTree.0: Readme if you feel like it.txt

_sText:
*NOTE*
The screenshots on this page are OLD ONES FROM BETA 1.
I will update them for Beta 3.



*EDIT*
A new .rar file has been uploaded of Beta 2, it fixes the Overview vtf file, adds the radar file and puts all the files i've used for the map in the BSP.



Beta 2 Changelog
* Fixed Bombsite B, added a roof, change around some props, changed the bombentity slightly and also removed the goldfish entity to prevent the defuse bug.

*Changed the Bombsite A bombentity to allow more options for planting the bomb.

*Changed the Angle for the Sun Entity

*Added Color Correction to improve the overall look.

*Removed my old logo

*Added some more lamps at the bottom of Bombsite B to make it a bit brighter

*Compiled with HDR (DOH!)

*Fixed some other minor stuff
